DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether new program Nuevo Amanecer ( A New Dawn ) , improve quality life Latinas diagnose breast cancer . Trained Latina counselor breast cancer provide support recently diagnose woman . The investigator call counselor peer support counselor .
DOC.brief_title: Nuevo Amanecer : Promoting Psychosocial Health Latinas
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess effectiveness cognitive-behavioral stress management ( CBSM ) intervention newly diagnose Latina breast cancer patient . In prior work , investigator establish appropriate content intervention , need early intervention , value culturally competent peer support . In study investigator adapt evidence-based CBSM intervention design meet need . This study use randomize control trial ( RCT ) design wait-listed usual care control group adapt intervention test effectiveness improve breast cancer specific quality-of-life , decrease anxiety breast cancer specific distress . The new , adapt intervention call `` Nuevo Amanecer '' ( A New Dawn ) .
DOC.criteria: Selfidentifies Latina Diagnosed Stage 0 , I , II , III prior month Primarily Spanishspeaking , Spanish monolingual Aged 18 old Diagnosed Alameda , Contra Costa , San Mateo , San Francisco Santa Clara county , California . Previous cancer diagnosis except nonmelanoma skin cancer Terminal illness Stage IV breast cancer ( distant metastasis )
